article_title: Health-care law fuels expansion at SIU family medicine clinic

article_metadata.description:
A $16 million expansion and renovation project underway at a federally subsidized medical clinic in Springfield will help accommodate the surging number of patients gaining insurance coverage through the Affordable Care Act, project supporters said Tuesday.
“There will be so much more access,” Dr. Janet Albers, chairwoman of Southern Illinois University School of Medicine’s department of family and community medicine, said of the expansion at the SIU Center for Family Medicine.
article_metadata.author: Dean Olsen
